name: NEW 2nd Floor, 2BR Downtown Boston
neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located in close proximity to all the activities of the city. Right across the street is Boston's Chinatown, a constantly lively part of the city - There's a 24 hr diner, plenty of restaurants closing near 3 am, and several bars and lounges surrounding the area. There are 'hubway' or bike rentals near the apartment for your leisurely traveling needs.
description:
Modern apartment in the heart of Boston.
2 bedrooms
One queen bed
Two twin beds
1 full bathroom
Full kitchen
Free wifi
Cable TV

Walking distance from Chinatown, Theater District, shopping centers, Boston Commons, multiple subway stations, Tufts Medical Center, and more.

The space
Our apartment is newly renovated with new furniture and appliances. Decorated with a modern feel.
There is 1 bedroom with a queen (11" memory foam mattress) and another bedroom with two twins, 1 bathroom, full kitchen and living room.
Max accommodation is 4 people.

This is a 4 story apartment. Each floor is separated. This unit is on the second floor.
Please email us if you need additional unit for extra people
